blocks.label: DESCRIPTION
blocks.content: The Simple Past is used for actions that started and finished in the past
When using did/didn't the verb returns to its base form (infinitive)

rows.group: One syllable ending in consonant + vowel + consonant (CVC)

blocks.label: -Ed endings
rows: after voiceless sounds (p, k, f, s, ʃ, tʃ, θ)
after voiced sounds (vowels, b, g, v, z, ʒ, m, n, l, r)
